text: oh boy. it just took me two hours to find this information … thanks! i wish this was at least somewhere mentioned in the legacy docs.
After a few more days of monkeying around with this I think there’s no other explanation. It’d be great if we can require different versions of api-client from serverless funcitons.
<@UUX58C0S3> curious to find out why not use the out of the box associated custom objects sidebar card.
